title: The $1BN Megaproject to Save California
description:
Meet the new infrastructure tackling California's water crisis.
Learn more about how Bentley is advancing the world’s infrastructure for better quality of life - https://bit.ly/4189jlA

This video contains paid promotion for Bentley Systems.

Full story here - https://theb1m.com/video/california-echowater-megaproject
